entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Having Space In Path Fails Builds On MacOS #50828
  • IHtmlContent can break ExceptionHandlerMiddleware and DeveloperExceptionPgaeMiddleware. Resulting in a blank page in production. #50825
  • URL for "/_framework..." flashes briefly in browser address bar when using streaming rendering & enhanced form handling with redirects in Blazor #50822
  • BlazorWasm build benchmark broken #50821
    8.0
  • [Antiforgery] Antiforgery middleware executes too early on the pipeline #50818
  • Inject CMS Content to Razor Components at compile time #50817
  • Map Razor Components collides with MapFallbackToPage #50816
  • UseHttpMethodOverride not working in .NET 8.0 RC1 #50815
  • Blazor WASM OIDC Authentication does not work with Zitadel Identity Provider #50812
  • Quarantine CanRenderComponentWithPersistedState(suppressEnhancedNavigation: False, renderMode: typeof(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web.InteractiveAutoRenderMode), streaming: "AutoStreaming"/null) #50810
    8.0
  • Blazor Server architectural concerns #50808
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #50807
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #50806
  • Section outlet doesn't update when section content is rendered with streaming rendering #50804
    8.0-rc2
  • Quarantine CanLaunchPhotinoWebViewAndClickButton #50802

Closed

  • [Blazor] Please provide/expose current CSS identifier for CSS isolation #50820
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #50805
  • Blazor component passed as cascading parameter is null when used in MainLayout.razor (.NET 8.0 RC 1) #50724
  • Missing .NET 8 RC Version for `Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.win-arm` #50791
  • Components with render attribute in the `LayoutComponentBase` are being recreated with each navigation #50766
  • Blazor antiforgery token issue when posting form (SSR) when user is logged in #50612
    8.0-rc2
  • BlazorWeb antiforgery issue on SignInAsync. #50760
  • [Regression] Error in HtmlRenderer when upgrading to net8 RC1 #50783
  • .Net 8 RC1 WASM - compatibility - lack of support for older systems #50729
  • Perf improvement: caching, mapaction #50770
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #50794

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2271271 #50824
    area-mvc
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc2' => 'release/8.0' #50823
    area-infrastructure, area-identity, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Stop processing original response streaming content if user has started navigating away #50814
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor
  • Quarantine (actually comment out) one of the CanRenderComponentWithPersistedState cases #50811
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Update Selenium versions #50809
    area-infrastructure
  • Quarantine CanLaunchPhotinoWebViewAndClickButton #50803
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Handle obsolete InterceptorsPreview with .NET 8 RC2 SDK #50797
    area-infrastructure, area-identity, tell-mode, 8.0-rc2
  • Update branding to RTM #50799
    area-infrastructure
  • Update SDK #50801
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • RequestQuery logging bug fix #50767
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-middleware
  • Try Adding Support for XForwardedPort #50338
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [Blazor] Error page support for Server Side Rendered Razor Component Applications #50550
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor
  • Add Identity Components to Blazor template #50722
    area-mvc
  • Update IAcceptsMetadata docs to reflect behavior of matcher policy #50747
    Docs, area-minimal
  • Retry stateful reconnect attempts #50745
    area-signalr
  • [release/8.0] Update SDK version #50734
    area-infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50792
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
